attributes.action: Refrain from offering an apology for Britains contribution to the Slave Trade.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the Slave Trade was indeed regrettable to say the least, the perpitrators and the victims are no longer with us.  Today we have all (black and white) indirectly benefitted from the Slave Trade, so I believe an apology is not in the nations gift, for those who truly deserve the apology again, they are no longer with us.  Do we approach Italy (Rome) French (Normans) Dutch (Danes) Norway ( Vikings) for an apology or compensation, I think not.
